progetto.view.commandline.printer

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.commandline.printer.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiceColorDrawable, DiceDrawable, DiceNumberDrawable, SquareDrawable

    public class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    a drawable object is a object that contains chars as pixel that can be composed to create a image
